hero.badge: AI Workshop for Dubai Real Estate Agents
hero.headline: Stop chasing leads that
hero.description: Learn how to build an AI-powered lead system that replies instantly, qualifies automatically, and finds the buyers who are actually serious.
hero.statsIntro: In this workshop, you'll build a system that can:
hero.stat1Label: Respond instantly, even while you sleep
hero.stat2Label: Saved every day on manual texting
hero.demoInputHint: Type a message to see AI in action
hero.demoResponsePlaceholder: Watch the AI respond to your message...
hero.demoResultDefault: Hot Lead Ready for Call - AED 2.8M Budget
hero.staticDemoMessage: Hi Ahmed, I saw you're interested in the Downtown villa. Are you looking for investment or personal use?

painPoints.title: You can close. Your systems can't keep up.
painPoints.subtitle: You've got the skills. You've closed the deals. But the lead volume has outpaced what any agent can handle manually. These are the problems everyone's dealing with.
painPoints.point1Title: Too many leads, not enough buyers
painPoints.point1Desc: You already know the drill. Most of the people reaching out aren't serious. Fake numbers, tire-kickers, people just browsing. It's exhausting.
painPoints.point2Desc: You spend hours every evening trying to figure out who's real and who's not. By the time you get to the good ones, you're already burnt out.
painPoints.point3Desc: Someone reaches out at 11pm and by morning they've already talked to three other agents. Speed matters, but you can't be on 24/7.
painPoints.point4Desc: Every buyer expects you to remember their name, their preferences, their timeline. That's hard when you're juggling 50 conversations a day.
painPoints.point5Desc: Your brokerage showed you how to close deals, not how to set up automations or use AI. So you're figuring it out as you go.
painPoints.point6Desc: Some of your competitors are already using these tools. They're responding quicker, qualifying faster, and closing more. You can feel it.

benefits.title: What if you could just... focus on the good ones?
benefits.subtitle: Imagine waking up to a list of people who are actually ready to buy. Budget confirmed. Timeline known. No more guessing. That's what we're building here.
benefits.benefit2: Stop wasting money on leads that go nowhere
benefits.benefit3: Reply to people instantly, even when you're asleep
benefits.benefit4: Know who's serious before you ever call them
benefits.benefit5: Keep that personal touch, without burning out
benefits.benefit6: Finally feel like you're ahead, not behind

details.title: You'll actually build something.
details.description: This isn't a seminar where someone talks at you for five hours and you leave with a notebook full of ideas you'll never use. By the end of the day, you'll have a real thing that works: a lead qualification system connected to your CRM that you can use right away.
details.feature1Desc: I show you how to set up the automation, step by step. You follow along. By the end, you own it.
details.feature2Title: Designed for how you actually work
details.feature2Desc: Not some generic template. We'll set up flows for the kind of leads you get: investors, end-users, off-plan buyers.
details.feature3Title: You don't need to know how to code
details.feature3Desc: If you can use Google Sheets, you can do this. The tools we use are visual. Just drag, drop, connect.
details.outcome1Desc: Walk out with a live system that qualifies and responds to leads on its own.
details.outcome2Desc: You'll start seeing all the little tasks you can automate, not just lead follow-up.
details.outcome3Desc: AI is changing how real estate works. You'll be the one who understands it, not the one scrambling to catch up.

about.title: Hey, I'm Eric.
about.name: Eric McQuesten
about.bio1: I've spent the last few years building AI and automation systems for businesses: sales teams, operations, customer service. I've seen what works and what doesn't.
about.bio2: When I started paying attention to Dubai real estate, I kept seeing the same thing: really talented agents drowning in admin work, barely keeping up with leads, and using tools their brokerages never taught them how to use properly.
about.bio3: Most agents I've talked to tell me they want to automate but don't know where to start. That's why I put this workshop together to actually show you how, step by step, in a way that makes sense.
about.bio4: No fluff. No theory. You'll leave with something that works.

waitlist.badge: Limited to 10 seats to keep it hands-on
waitlist.title: Join the waitlist.
waitlist.subtitle: Dates are being finalized. Sign up below and you'll be the first to know when registration opens.
waitlist.experienceSome: Some Experience - Used a few tools
waitlist.problemLabel: What's taking up most of your time right now?
waitlist.problemPlaceholder: e.g., I spend hours every day sorting through leads...
waitlist.successMessage: Thanks for signing up. I'll be in touch soon with workshop dates and next steps.
waitlist.footerNote: I'll email you when dates are set. No spam, just workshop updates.

philosophy.quote: "We don't use tools for tools' sake. We start with the question:
philosophy.quoteHighlight: What are you trying to accomplish?
philosophy.description: Sometimes the answer isn't AI. We'll help you figure out when it is, and when it isn't.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.introP1: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of this website and your participation in the AI Automation Workshop for Real Estate Professionals ("the Workshop") hosted by FutureProofed ("we," "us," or "our"). By accessing this website, joining our waitlist, or registering for the Workshop, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions in their entirety.
terms.introP2: Please read these terms carefully before submitting any information or making any payment.
terms.registrationP1: Registration for the Workshop is confirmed only upon receipt of full payment. By completing payment, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions.
terms.registrationP2: Workshop fees are listed in US Dollars (USD) and must be paid in full at the time of registration. We reserve the right to change Workshop pricing at any time, but any price changes will not affect registrations that have already been confirmed and paid.
terms.refundP2: Once payment has been made, no refunds will be issued for any reason, including but not limited to:
terms.refundItem1: Change of mind or personal circumstances
terms.refundItem2: Inability to attend due to scheduling conflicts
terms.refundItem3: Failure to attend the Workshop on the scheduled date
terms.refundItem4: Dissatisfaction with the Workshop content or delivery
terms.refundItem5: Technical difficulties experienced by the participant
terms.refundP3: By completing payment, you acknowledge and accept this no-refund policy.
terms.transferP1: Your Workshop registration is personal to you and is non-transferable. You may not sell, assign, or transfer your registration or attendance rights to another individual or entity under any circumstances.
terms.transferP2: If you are unable to attend, your registration will be forfeited and no refund, credit, or transfer will be provided.
terms.recordingP1: By registering for and attending the Workshop, you acknowledge and consent that the Workshop will be recorded. This recording may include video, audio, photographs, screen captures, and any other form of media capture.
terms.recordingP2: You grant FutureProofed and its affiliates a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free, fully transferable license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, display, and create derivative works from any recordings, photographs, or other media in which you appear or in which your voice, likeness, name, image, statements, or contributions are captured.
terms.recordingP3: This content may be used for any purpose, including but not limited to:
terms.recordingItem1: Creating educational products, courses, or resources for sale or distribution
terms.recordingItem3: Social media content across all platforms
terms.recordingItem4: Website content, blog posts, and articles
terms.recordingItem5: Podcasts, video series, and other audio-visual content
terms.recordingItem6: Case studies, testimonials, and success stories
terms.recordingItem8: Any other content repurposing as we see fit
terms.recordingP4: You waive any right to inspect or approve the finished recordings or the manner in which they are used. You also waive any right to compensation, royalties, or payment of any kind for the use of such recordings or content.
terms.recordingP5: You release FutureProofed, its owners, employees, contractors, and affiliates from any and all claims, demands, or liabilities arising from or related to the recording, use, or distribution of any media in which you appear.
terms.recordingP6: If you have specific concerns about being recorded or appearing in any media, you must notify us in writing at eric@futureproofed.io prior to the Workshop date. We will make reasonable efforts to accommodate your request, but we cannot guarantee that you will not appear in any background footage or group recordings.
terms.contributionsP1: Any questions, comments, ideas, suggestions, workflows, or other contributions you share during the Workshop may be used by FutureProofed without restriction. By participating, you grant us a perpetual, royalty-free license to use any content or ideas you contribute during the Workshop for any purpose, including incorporation into future workshops, courses, products, or materials.
terms.contributionsP2: You will not be entitled to any compensation, credit, or attribution for such contributions unless separately agreed in writing.
terms.deliveryP1: We reserve the right to make reasonable changes to the Workshop content, schedule, format, venue, or instructors at any time without prior notice. While we will make every effort to deliver the Workshop as advertised, we do not guarantee that specific topics, tools, or outcomes will be covered or achieved.
terms.deliveryP2: The Workshop is provided on an "as is" basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, regarding the Workshop content, delivery, or outcomes.
terms.requirementsP1: Participants are required to bring their own laptop to the Workshop. We are not responsible for providing equipment, and failure to bring a suitable device may limit your ability to participate fully.
terms.requirementsP2: Participants are responsible for ensuring they have a stable internet connection if any portion of the Workshop requires online access.
terms.requirementsP3: You agree to conduct yourself professionally and respectfully throughout the Workshop. We reserve the right to remove any participant whose behavior is disruptive, inappropriate, or violates these terms, without refund.
terms.resultsP1: The Workshop is intended for educational and informational purposes only. We do not guarantee any specific results, outcomes, or business improvements from your participation.
terms.resultsP2: Any examples, case studies, or success stories shared during the Workshop are for illustrative purposes only and should not be interpreted as promises or guarantees of similar results. Your results will depend on many factors, including your own effort, business circumstances, and implementation.
terms.resultsP3: You acknowledge that the success of any automation or workflow you build is your sole responsibility.
terms.ipP1: All Workshop content, materials, presentations, handouts, recordings, and resources are the intellectual property of FutureProofed and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.ipP2: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Workshop materials for your personal, non-commercial use only. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, publicly display, sell, or create derivative works from any Workshop materials without our prior written consent.
terms.ipP3: You may not record, photograph, or capture any portion of the Workshop (audio, video, or otherwise) without our express written permission. Unauthorized recording is strictly prohibited and may result in removal from the Workshop without refund and potential legal action.
terms.confidentialityP1: During the Workshop, other participants may share personal business information, challenges, or strategies. You agree to treat any information shared by other participants as confidential and not to disclose, share, or use such information outside of the Workshop without the express consent of the individual who shared it.

terms.liabilityP2: Our total liability to you for any claims arising from the Workshop shall not exceed the amount you paid for your Workshop registration.

terms.cancellationP2: In the event of cancellation by us, registered participants will be offered either a full refund or the option to transfer their registration to a rescheduled date, at our discretion.
terms.cancellationP3: In the event of postponement, your registration will automatically transfer to the new date. If you are unable to attend the rescheduled Workshop, you may request a refund, which will be granted at our sole discretion.
terms.waitlistP1: By joining our waitlist, you consent to receive email communications from us regarding the Workshop and related offerings. You may unsubscribe at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in any email or by contacting us directly.
terms.waitlistP2: Joining the waitlist does not guarantee a spot in the Workshop. Registration is confirmed only upon successful payment.
terms.thirdPartyP1: The Workshop may reference or utilize third-party tools, platforms, or services such as n8n, Make.com, or others. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or responsible for any third-party tools or services mentioned during the Workshop.
terms.thirdPartyP2: Your use of any third-party tools is subject to their respective terms of service and privacy policies. We are not liable for any issues, costs, or damages arising from your use of third-party tools.
terms.consultingP1: Consulting and custom workflow build services are separate from the Workshop and are subject to separate agreements and pricing. Workshop registration does not include or entitle you to any consulting or custom build services.
terms.consultingP2: Any consulting or custom build engagements will be governed by a separate agreement between you and FutureProofed.
terms.privacyRefP1: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information about how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
terms.modificationsP1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this website. Your continued use of this website or participation in the Workshop after any modifications indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.modificationsP2: It is your responsibility to review these Terms and Conditions periodically for changes.
terms.severabilityP1: If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, such finding shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions, which shall continue in full force and effect.
terms.entireP1: These Terms and Conditions, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and FutureProofed regarding your use of this website and participation in the Workshop, and supersede all prior agreements, representations, or understandings.
terms.governingP1: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms or the Workshop shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Dubai, UAE.
terms.contactP1: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introP1: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and submit your information to join our waitlist for the AI Automation Workshop for Real Estate Professionals.
privacy.introP2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data with transparency and care. We will never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.
privacy.collectP1: When you join our waitlist, we collect the following information:
privacy.collectItem4: Your self-reported level of experience with AI and automation
privacy.collectItem5: Your responses regarding current business challenges and desired solutions
privacy.collectP2: We may also automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, device type, and pages visited. This is collected through standard analytics tools to help us understand how visitors interact with our site.
privacy.useP1: We use the information you provide solely for the following purposes:
privacy.useItem1: To add you to our waitlist and notify you when registration opens
privacy.useItem2: To send you updates about the workshop, including dates, location, and logistics
privacy.useItem3: To tailor the workshop content based on the challenges and needs you share with us
privacy.useItem4: To respond to your inquiries if you contact us directly
privacy.useItem5: To improve our website and user experience
privacy.useP2: We will not use your information for:
privacy.useNotItem1: Selling or sharing with third parties for their marketing purposes
privacy.useNotItem2: Sending unrelated promotional content or spam
privacy.useNotItem3: Any purpose beyond what is directly related to the AI Automation Workshop
privacy.emailP1: By joining our waitlist, you consent to receive email communications from us regarding the workshop. These may include:
privacy.emailP2: You may unsubscribe from these communications at any time by clicking the "unsubscribe" link at the bottom of any email or by contacting us directly. If you unsubscribe, we will promptly remove you from our mailing list, though we may retain your information in our records for administrative purposes unless you request full deletion.
privacy.storageP1: Your personal information is stored securely using industry-standard tools and platforms. We use trusted third-party services for data management, including:
privacy.storageItem1: Airtable for securely storing waitlist submissions
privacy.storageItem2: Email marketing software for managing communications
privacy.storageP2: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.retentionP1: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Specifically:
privacy.retentionItem1: If you attend the workshop, we may retain your information for follow-up communications and future offerings unless you opt out
privacy.retentionItem2: If you do not attend or the workshop does not proceed, we will retain your information for a maximum of 24 months, after which it will be deleted unless you request earlier deletion
privacy.retentionItem3: You may request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us
privacy.rightsP1: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy.rightsAccessDesc: You may request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
privacy.rightsCorrectionDesc: You may request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete information
privacy.rightsDeletionDesc: You may request that we delete your personal data from our systems
privacy.rightsWithdrawalDesc: You may withdraw your consent to receive communications at any time
privacy.rightsP2: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided below. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe.
privacy.thirdPartyP1: We use third-party services to operate our website and manage your data. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them:
privacy.thirdPartyP2: We only share the minimum information necessary with these services to fulfill the purposes described in this policy. We do not sell or provide your data to any third parties for independent use.
privacy.cookiesP1: Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and collect analytics data. These may include:
privacy.cookiesItem1: Essential cookies required for the website to function
privacy.cookiesItem2: Analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site
privacy.cookiesP2: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect your experience on the site.
privacy.childrenP1: Our website and services are not directed at individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected data from a minor, we will take steps to delete it promptly.
privacy.changesP1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. When we make changes, we will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
privacy.contactP1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, wish to exercise your rights, or have concerns about how your data is handled, please contact us at:
privacy.governingP1: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes arising from this policy shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of Dubai.
